title: DomDomSoft Anime Downloader v1.3 [Cracked]
description:
General Release Notes

From domdomsoft.com:

"Now you can download anime with ease. DomDomSoft Anime Downloader has large collection, HD quality, fast download speed and update daily."

Many many thanks to feen with CAUSTiC for creating this.  All credit goes to them.

To crack your program:

1) Install the program.  Run DomDomSoftAnimeDownloader_1.3_Installer.exe

2) Run keygen program, keygen.exe

3) Click the button that says "Patch."  This should apply the patch to your program files

4) Type in an email address.  Note that what you type here does not affect anything

5) Copy the key that is generated

6) Run the main program

7) Click the "Register Full Version" button

8) Type in the same email address you used for the crack and the generated key in their respective fields

9) Hit "OK."  Your program should now be the full version allowing for unlimited downloads rather than being restricted to 5 every 24 hours

Enjoy, and make sure to seed!

//Uploaded by Matoro


***
